<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Commencing with the KPI Metrics Report in respect of the fiscal year of PMI ending 31&nbsp;December 2022 and ending
with the KPI Metrics Report in respect of the fiscal year of PMI ending 31&nbsp;December 2025, PMI shall supply to the Facility Agent by 30&nbsp;May of each year a Pricing Certificate. PMI shall deliver no further Pricing Certificates thereafter. If
this Agreement is extended in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.24(a), the Pricing Certificate delivered by PMI in accordance of this section for the fiscal year of PMI ending 31&nbsp;December 2025 shall apply until the Extended Maturity Date. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each KPI Metrics Report delivered by PMI shall include, or be accompanied by, a limited assurance report in respect
of the KPI Metrics from a qualified external reviewer with relevant expertise appointed by PMI from time to time to provide an independent practitioner&#146;s limited assurance report in respect of the KPI Metrics. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The information set out in any Pricing Certificate shall be based on the information set out in the KPI Metrics
Report for the relevant fiscal year. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt, PMI shall not have any obligation to <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">re-calculate</FONT> any information set out in any historic Pricing Certificate in the event of any changes to the business transformation-linked terms of this Agreement in accordance with Section&nbsp;9.1. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No Default or Event of Default shall occur solely by reason of a failure to comply with this Section&nbsp;2.26 or by
reason of a failure to meet one or more of the Sustainability Performance Targets. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">46 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">CONDITIONS TO EFFECTIVENESS AND LENDING </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.1.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><U>Conditions Precedent to Effectiveness</U>. This Agreement shall become effective on and as of the first date
(the &#147;<U>Effective Date</U>&#148;) on which the following conditions precedent have been satisfied: </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;PMI shall have notified each Lender and the Facility Agent in writing as to the proposed Effective Date. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;On the Effective Date, the following statements shall be true and the Facility Agent shall have received for the
account of each Lender a certificate signed by a duly authorized officer of PMI, dated the Effective Date, stating that: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:18%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the representations and warranties contained in Section&nbsp;4.1 are correct on and as of the Effective Date, and
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:18%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no event has occurred and is continuing that constitutes a Default or Event of Default. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Facility Agent shall have received on or before the Effective Date copies of the letter from PMI dated on or
before such day, terminating in whole the commitments of the lenders party to the Existing Credit Agreement. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to or simultaneously with the Effective Date, PMI shall have satisfied all of its obligations under the
Existing Credit Agreement including, without limitation, the payment of all loans, accrued interest and fees. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Facility Agent shall have received on or before the Effective Date the following, each dated such day, in form
and substance satisfactory to the Facility Agent (acting on its own behalf and on behalf of the Lenders): </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:18%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Certified copies of the resolutions of the Board of Directors of PMI approving this Agreement, and of all documents
evidencing other necessary corporate action and governmental approvals, if any, with respect to this Agreement. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:18%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A certificate of the Secretary or an Assistant Secretary of PMI certifying the names and true signatures of the
officers of PMI authorized to sign this Agreement and the other documents to be delivered hereunder. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:18%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Favorable opinions of counsel (which may be <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">in-house</FONT> counsel) for PMI,
substantially in the form of Exhibits <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">E-1</FONT> and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">E-2</FONT> hereto. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:18%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A favorable opinion of Simpson Thacher&nbsp;&amp; Bartlett LLP, counsel for the Facility Agent, substantially in
the form of Exhibit G hereto. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">47 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:18%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A certificate of the chief financial officer or treasurer of PMI
certifying that as of 31&nbsp;December 2020 (A) the aggregate amount of Debt, payment of which is secured by any Lien referred to in clause (iii)&nbsp;of Section&nbsp;5.2(a), does not exceed $400,000,000, and (B)&nbsp;the aggregate amount of Debt
included in clause (A)&nbsp;of this subsection (v), payment of which is secured by any Lien referred to in clause (iv)&nbsp;of Section&nbsp;5.2(a), does not exceed $200,000,000. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;PMI shall have paid all accrued fees and reasonable expenses of the Facility Agent and the Lenders with respect to
this Agreement for which the Facility Agent shall have made reasonable demand in accordance with Section&nbsp;9.4(a) on or prior to the Effective Date. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement shall have been executed by PMI, Citi, as Facility Agent, and Citibank, as Swingline Agent and the
Facility Agent shall have been notified by each Initial Lender that such Initial Lender has executed this Agreement. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i) The Facility Agent shall have received, at least five days prior to the Effective Date, all documentation and
other information regarding PMI reasonably requested in connection with applicable &#147;know your customer&#148; and anti-money laundering rules and regulations, including the Patriot Act, to the extent requested in writing of PMI at least fifteen
days prior to the Effective Date and (ii)&nbsp;if PMI qualifies as a &#147;legal entity customer&#148; under 31 C.F.R. &#167; 1010.230, any Lender that has requested a Beneficial Ownership Certification in a written notice to PMI at least fifteen
days prior to the Effective Date, shall have received such Beneficial Ownership Certification at least five days prior to the Effective Date (<U>provided</U> that, upon the execution and delivery by the Facility Agent or any such Lender of its
signature page to this Agreement, the respective condition set forth in this Section&nbsp;3.1(h) shall be deemed to be satisfied). </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Facility Agent
shall notify PMI and the Initial Lenders of the date which is the Effective Date upon satisfaction of all of the conditions precedent set forth in this Section&nbsp;3.1. For purposes of determining compliance with the conditions specified in this
Section&nbsp;3.1, each Lender shall be deemed to have consented to, approved or accepted or to be satisfied with each document or other matter required thereunder to be consented to or approved by or acceptable or satisfactory to the Lenders unless
an officer of the Facility Agent responsible for the transactions contemplated by this Agreement shall have received notice from such Lender prior to the date that PMI, by notice to the Lenders, designates as the proposed Effective Date, specifying
its objection thereto. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.2.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><U>Initial Advance to Each Designated Subsidiary</U>. The obligation of each Lender to make an initial Advance
to each Designated Subsidiary following any designation of such Designated Subsidiary as a Borrower hereunder pursuant to Section&nbsp;9.8 is subject to the receipt by the Facility Agent on or before the date of such initial Advance of each of the
following, in form and substance satisfactory to the Facility Agent (acting on its own behalf and on behalf of the Lenders), and dated such date, and in sufficient copies for each Lender: </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">48 </P>

such Designated Subsidiary (with a certified English translation if the original thereof is not in English) approving this Agreement, and of all documents evidencing other necessary corporate action and governmental approvals, if any, with respect
to this Agreement. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A certificate of a proper officer of such Designated Subsidiary certifying the names and
true signatures of the officers of such Designated Subsidiary authorized to sign the Designation Agreement and the other documents to be delivered hereunder. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A certificate signed by a duly authorized officer of the Designated Subsidiary, dated as of the date of such initial
Advance, certifying that such Designated Subsidiary shall have obtained all governmental and third party authorizations, consents, approvals (including exchange control approvals) and licenses required under applicable laws and regulations necessary
for such Designated Subsidiary to execute and deliver the Designation Agreement and to perform its obligations hereunder. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Designation Agreement of such Designated Subsidiary, substantially in the form of Exhibit&nbsp;D hereto. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A favorable opinion of counsel (which may be <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">in-house</FONT> counsel) to such
Designated Subsidiary, dated the date of such initial Advance, covering, to the extent customary and appropriate for the relevant jurisdiction, the opinions outlined on Exhibit&nbsp;F hereto. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Such other approvals, opinions or documents as any Lender, through the Facility Agent may reasonably request,
including, without limitation, information required in accordance with the Patriot Act or any similar &#147;know your customer&#148; or other similar checks under all applicable laws and regulations. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.3.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><U>Conditions Precedent to Each Borrowing</U>. The obligation of each Lender to make an Advance on the occasion
of each Borrowing is subject to the conditions precedent that the Effective Date shall have occurred and on the date of such Borrowing the following statements shall be true, and the acceptance by the Borrower of the proceeds of such Borrowing shall
be a representation by such Borrower or by PMI, as the case may be, that: </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the representations
and warranties contained in Section&nbsp;4.1 (except the representations set forth in the last sentence of subsection (e)&nbsp;and in subsection&nbsp;(f) thereof (other than clause (i)&nbsp;thereof)) are correct on and as of the date of such
Borrowing, before and after giving effect to such Borrowing and to the application of the proceeds therefrom, as though made on and as of such date, and, if such Borrowing shall have been requested by a Designated Subsidiary, the representations and
warranties of such Designated Subsidiary contained in its Designation Agreement are correct on and as of the date of such Borrowing, before and after giving effect to such Borrowing and to the application of the proceeds therefrom, as though made on
and as of such date; </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">49 </P>

Borrowings on such date (together with any other resources of the Borrower applied together therewith) no event has occurred and is continuing, or would result from such Borrowing, that constitutes a Default or Event of Default; and </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if such Borrowing is in an aggregate principal amount equal to or greater than $500,000,000, or the Equivalent in
Euro thereof, and is being made in connection with any purchase of shares of such Borrower&#146;s or PMI&#146;s capital stock or the capital stock of any other Person, or any purchase of all or substantially all of the assets of any Person (whether
in one transaction or a series of transactions) or any transaction of the type referred to in Section&nbsp;5.2(b), the statement in (b)&nbsp;above shall also be true on a pro forma basis as if such transaction or purchase shall have been completed.

<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">4.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">4.1.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><U>Representations and Warranties of PMI</U>. PMI represents and warrants as follows: </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It is duly organized, validly existing and in good standing under the laws of its jurisdiction of organization. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The execution, delivery and performance of this Agreement and the Notes to be delivered by it are within its
corporate powers, have been duly authorized by all necessary corporate action, and do not contravene (i)&nbsp;its charter or <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">by-laws</FONT> or (ii)&nbsp;in any material respect, any law, rule, regulation or order of
any court or governmental agency or any contractual restriction binding on or affecting it. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No authorization or
approval or other action by, and no notice to or filing with, any governmental authority or regulatory body is required for the due execution, delivery and performance by it of this Agreement or the Notes to be delivered by it. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement is, and each of the Notes to be delivered by it when delivered hereunder will be, a legal, valid and
binding obligation of PMI enforceable against PMI in accordance with its terms, subject to the effect of any applicable bankruptcy, insolvency, fraudulent conveyance, reorganization, moratorium and other laws affecting creditors&#146; rights
generally and subject, as to enforceability, to general principles of equity (regardless of whether enforcement is sought in a proceeding in equity or at law) and an implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As reported in PMI&#146;s Annual Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the year ended
31&nbsp;December 2020, the consolidated balance sheets of PMI and its Subsidiaries as of 31&nbsp;December 2020 and the consolidated statements of earnings of PMI and its Subsidiaries for the year then ended fairly present, in all material respects,
the consolidated financial position of PMI and its Subsidiaries as at such date and the consolidated results of the operations of PMI and its Subsidiaries for the year ended on such date, all in accordance with accounting principles generally
accepted in the United States. Except as disclosed in PMI&#146;s Annual Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the year ended 31&nbsp;December 2020, Quarterly </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">50 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">
Reports on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-Q</FONT> for the quarters ended 31&nbsp;March 2021 and 30&nbsp;June 2021, and in any Current Report on Form
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">8-K</FONT> filed subsequent to 31&nbsp;December 2020, but prior to 29&nbsp;September 2021, since 31&nbsp;December 2020 there has been no material adverse change in such position or operations. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;There is no pending or threatened action or proceeding affecting it or any of its Subsidiaries before any court,
governmental agency or arbitrator (a &#147;<U>Proceeding</U>&#148;), (i)&nbsp;that purports to affect the legality, validity or enforceability of this Agreement or (ii)&nbsp;except for Proceedings disclosed in PMI&#146;s Annual Report on Form <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the year ended 31&nbsp;December 2020, Quarterly Reports on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-Q</FONT> for the quarters ended 31&nbsp;March 2021 and 30&nbsp;June 2021, any Current Report on Form <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">8-K</FONT> filed subsequent to 31&nbsp;December 2020, but prior to 29&nbsp;September 2021 and, with respect to Proceedings commenced after the date of such filing but prior to 29&nbsp;September 2021, a certificate
delivered to the Lenders, that may materially adversely affect the financial position or results of operations of PMI and its Subsidiaries taken as a whole. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It owns directly or indirectly 100% of the capital stock of each other Borrower. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;None of the proceeds of any Advance will be used, directly or indirectly, for the purpose of purchasing or carrying
any Margin Stock or for the purpose of reducing or retiring any indebtedness which was originally incurred to purchase or carry any Margin Stock or for any other purpose that would constitute the Advances as a &#147;purpose credit&#148; within the
meaning of Regulation U and, in each case, would constitute a violation of Regulation U. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Neither PMI nor any
Borrower (i)&nbsp;is a person named on the list of &#147;Specially Designated Nationals&#148; or &#147;Blocked Persons&#148; maintained by The Office of Foreign Assets Control of the United States Department of the Treasury (the
&#147;<U>OFAC</U>&#148;) available at <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">http://www.treasury.gov/resource-center/sanctions/SDN-List/Pages/default.aspx,</FONT> or as otherwise published from time to time; or (ii)&nbsp;is (x) an agency of the government
of a country, (y)&nbsp;an organization controlled by a country, or (z)&nbsp;a person resident in a country that is subject to a sanctions program identified on the list maintained by the OFAC and available at
http://www.treasury.gov/resource-center/sanctions/Pages/default.aspx, or as otherwise published from time to time, as such program may be applicable to such agency, organization or person; or (iii)&nbsp;derives more than 10% of its assets or
operating income from investments in or transactions with any such country, agency, organization or person. Neither PMI nor any Borrower will use the proceeds of the Advances to finance any operations, investments or activities in, or make any
payments to, any such country, agency, organization, or person. The use of the proceeds of the Advances will not violate Anti-Corruption Laws or applicable Sanctions. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">5.1.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><U>Affirmative Covenants</U>. So long as any Advance shall remain unpaid or any Lender shall have any
Commitment hereunder, PMI will: </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">51 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Compliance with Laws, Etc</U>. (i)&nbsp;Comply, and cause each
Major Subsidiary to comply, in all material respects, with all applicable laws, rules, regulations and orders (such compliance to include, without limitation, complying with ERISA and Anti-Corruption Laws and paying before the same become delinquent
all taxes, assessments and governmental charges imposed upon it or upon its property except to the extent contested in good faith), noncompliance with which would materially adversely affect the financial condition or operations of PMI and its
Subsidiaries taken as a whole, and (ii)&nbsp;maintain in effect and enforce policies and procedures designed to ensure, in its reasonable judgment, compliance in all material respects by PMI, the Borrowers, the Major Subsidiaries and each of their
respective directors, officers, employees and agents with Anti-Corruption Laws and applicable Sanctions. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Reporting Requirements</U>. Furnish to the Lenders or make available on the internet at www.pmi.com (or any
successor or replacement website thereof), if such website includes an option to subscribe to a free service alerting subscribers by email of new U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission filings, if available, or by similar electronic means: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:18%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;as soon as available and in any event within 60 days after the end of each of the first three quarters of each
fiscal year of PMI, an unaudited interim condensed consolidated balance sheet of PMI and its Subsidiaries as of the end of such quarter and unaudited interim condensed consolidated statements of earnings of PMI and its Subsidiaries for the period
commencing at the end of the previous fiscal year and ending with the end of such quarter, certified by the chief financial officer of PMI; </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="22%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(A)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">as soon as available and in any event within 100 days after the end of each fiscal year of PMI, a copy of the
consolidated financial statements for such year for PMI and its Subsidiaries audited by PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (or other independent auditors which, as of the date of this Agreement, are one of the &#147;big four&#148; accounting firms); and
